name: Die Die Die And Try
description:
Die die die and Try is a 3rd person death runner game.You are a young barbarian and have to run as fast as possible to get the treasure in the castle.

Pay attention because there are many traps on the way, and they all want to kill you !
All you have to do is run and jump!
  • No save.
  • Only some checkpoints to respawn if you die.
  • Don't get hit too much or you will die
  • Run, wait and jump to dodge traps !
  • Finish as fast as possible to get the lowest time
  • One map with different worlds.
